name: Star Wars Battlefront II (2017)
description: Only sets up Origin and DXVK. You will need to download Battlefront II manually within Origin.
notes: Please read before installing: https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/Game:-Origin In order for mouse controls to work while in-game, the variable GstInput.MouseRawInput 1 must be changed to GstInput.MouseRawInput 0 within drive_c/users/$USER/My Documents/STAR WARS Battlefront II/settings/ProfileOptions_profile_synced More information is available https://www.reddit.com/r/wine_gaming/comments/esgl76/how_to_get_star_wars_battlefront_ii2017_to_run_on/. There has also been success using Tk-Glitch's wine builds to fix mouse input. Releases are available at: https://github.com/Tk-Glitch/PKGBUILDS/releases

input_menu.description: Setting DXVK workarounds please choose your GPU:
input_menu.preselect: Not needed for AMD. Ignore this.

task.description: Installing Origin... Login window will pop-up and close.
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- client: https://origin-a.akamaihd.net/Origin-Client-Download/origin/live/OriginThinSetup.exe
- updater: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DrDoctor13/wine-origin-updater/master/updateorigin.sh
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Origin/Origin.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    command: mkdir "$GAMEDIR/bfv-nv-shaders"
- input_menu:
    description: 'Setting DXVK workarounds please choose your GPU:'
    id: GPU
    options:
    - Not needed for AMD. Ignore this.: AMD
    - dxgi.customVendorId = 10DE dxgi.customDeviceId = 1C81 dxgi.nvapiHack = True: Nvidia
    preselect: Not needed for AMD. Ignore this.
- write_file:
    content: $INPUT_GPU
    file: $GAMEDIR/dxvk.conf
- task:
    app: nocrashdialog vcrun2017 win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    description: Installing Origin... Login window will pop-up and close.
    exclude_processes: Origin.exe OriginClientService.exe OriginWebHelperService.exe
      QtWebEngineProcess.exe
    executable: client
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- chmodx: updater
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Origin
    src: updater
system:
  disable_runtime: false
  env:
    DXVK_CONFIG_FILE: $GAMEDIR/dxvk.conf
    DXVK_HUD: fps
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  overrides:
    OriginThinSetupInternal.exe: disabled
    nvapi,nvapi64: disabled
